creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: tall, narrow blue cylinder mounted into metal bracket within wooden wedge; a few wavy horizontal lines incised around cylinder with incised spots
markings: sticker on back of wedge: [T-1501]; on bottom of base: [16]
medium: Porcelain with pale bluish glaze (seihakuji); metal; wood
signed: incised under glaze near base: [2/5 S. Fukami]
title: Cylinder
